body:
Comment 1: 
This usage is incompatible with the current more
general usage where you can say

godoc strings TrimSpace TrimFunc

or

godoc strings Trim.*

Also the analogy breaks down for packages whose
import path is not the package name: container/vector.Vector
is not the go identifier, and bytes.Len is not the name of
an identifier either, but both of

godoc container/vector Vector
godoc bytes Len

produce useful output.

Russ
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
